qas.question: Who took control when Doson died?
Which ruler had the last, best chance of uniting Greece?
What was Philip V known as?
When was the Peace of Naupactus?

context: <a1_0><a2_0>Philip V<a2_0/><a1_0/>, who came to power when Doson died in <a0_0>221 BC<a0_0/>, was the last Macedonian ruler with both the talent and the opportunity to unite Greece and preserve its independence against the "cloud rising in the west": the ever-increasing power of Rome. He was known as "<a3_0>the darling of Hellas<a3_0/>". Under his auspices the Peace of Naupactus (<a4_0>217 BC<a4_0/>) brought the latest war between Macedon and the Greek leagues (the social war 220-217) to an end, and at this time he controlled all of Greece except Athens, Rhodes and Pergamum.
